screen.lazyshuffle.text:
Clicking this button §c§lWILL RESET ALL YOUR PRESETS§r and replace them with skins in the §n§bconfig/skinshuffle/skins/lazyshuffle§r folder.

§l§nHow to use this mod?:§r
screen.lazyshuffle.instruction.skin_fold: §e1)§r Place your skins in the folder: §n§bconfig/skinshuffle/skins/lazyshuffle§r.
screen.lazyshuffle.instruction.model: §e2)§r To use the §6Classic§r model, ensure the file name does not contain §6_slim§r. Add §6_slim§r to the name for the §6Slim§r model.
screen.lazyshuffle.instruction.model_exa:
§eExamples:§r
- To use the §6Classic§r (Steve) model, name your file like §b"skinname.png"§r.
- To use the §6Slim§r (Alex) model, name your file like §b"skinname_slim.png"§r.
screen.lazyshuffle.instruction.final: §e3)§r After completing all steps, press the §a§lContinue§r button to apply the changes!
screen.lazyshuffle.instruction.backup_tw:
§e1)§r Navigate to §nconfig/skinshuffle/backup§r folder.
§e2)§r Find the latest backup.
§e3)§r Close Minecraft.
§e4)§r Rename it to §bpresets.json§r and replace the existing §bpresets.json§r in §nconfig/skinshuffle§r.
screen.lazyshuffle.attention:
§4§lAttention!§r
§cDo not open the presets if you removed a skin from the §bconfig/skinshuffle/skins/lazyshuffle§r§c folder. Doing so will cause a §eNullPointerException§r§c crash in Minecraft.

§eTo safely remove a skin:§r
1) Exit Minecraft.
2) Remove the skin file from the folder.
3) Press §eUpdate Skins§r button to reload skins.
screen.lazyshuffle.title: §4§lAttention!§r
toast.lazyshuffle.title: §a§lSuccess!§r
